N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7677.10 - Staffing, program space, resources and materials

State Regulations
(a) The staffing levels for teaching
personnel and education counselors in each facility shall be adequate to meet
the department's stated goals and objectives and the requirements of this

Part. (b) The department shall
establish a student/teacher ratio for each class which meets the demands of the
programs taught. (c) The department
shall design and provide adequate appropriate classroom space at each
correctional facility. (d) Academic
education personnel shall be furnished with an adequate supply of those
materials, resources and specialized equipment the department deems necessary
for an effective academic education program. Notes
